Summary: oval , with light all around making a loud buzzing sound
trends: There have been no other sightings in St Leonard
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailshi i just want to report a ufo that my 2 friends and i saw in the late 1980's, i email many places but not once got any feedback , and am not asking for anybody to believe my story but i just want to know if anybody alse reported seeing anything in montreal canada, i was about 8 or 9 years old it must of been in 1988 to maybe 1990 we dont remember exactly , i was playing on the streets with my older sister and a friend , when all of a sudden we heard a loud buzzing noise , a constant noise , when right on top of us we saw a oval shapped object with many lights around it flying slowly , but the thing that feaks me out the most is that it was so low and i live right next to a busy highway , so there must of been thousands of people who saw it , the object was travaling east at at very slow pace , and we could of seen it perfectly , just like a cartoon , other then the buzzing noise there was no smoke just lights when all of sudden the ufo just flu back where it came from and that was it , am not asking for anybody to believe me cause i wouldnt myself but am just looking for answers and if anybody alse seen it , i did many researce and i heard of a story on are news paper that there was a sighting near the olympic stadium in the 1990's i just wanted to know if you had any information , i also called a couple of doctors to Hypnotize me because i wanted find a way to prove it , but i also wanted to know ,where can i go to get a lie decting test done please send me any information about this thank you montreal,canada,
